Put the spotless potatoes , tomatoes and tobacco atoms into the hot pot ., 把无斑点的土豆 , 番茄和烟草微粒放进热锅里.
my coat , my shoes , my spotless gloves ., 我的大衣 , 鞋子 , 干净的手套.
